mergeron.demo.visualize_empirical_margin_distribution
=====================================================

.. py:module:: mergeron.demo.visualize_empirical_margin_distribution

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Plot the empirical distribution derived using the Gaussian KDE with
   margin data downloaded from Prof. Damodaran's website at NYU.






Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: SAMPLE_SIZE

.. py:data:: BIN_COUNT
   :value: 25


.. py:data:: mgn_kde

.. py:data:: mgn_xvec
